item.title: US Birthrate Dips Slightly in 2022 After Rebound in Prior Year
item.description: The US birth rate declined slightly in 2022 after rebounding in 2021. The total fertility rate in 2022 was 1.69 births per woman, down from 1.77 births per woman in 2021. The decline in births was widespread, with 38 states and the District of Columbia experiencing a drop.
